description: Set DS data from json data,  {} is accepted but will function as removing all json data (use puppet_ds::unset_ds task) otherwise provide valid json for setting ds.

ds_json.description: json hash of DS data, the minimal object is { "base_dn": "ou=mathematicians,dc=example,dc=com", "display_name": "ldap.forumsys.com", "group_lookup_attr": "ou", "group_member_attr": "member", "group_name_attr": "name", "hostname": "ldap.forumsys.com", "port": 389, "ssl": false, "user_display_name_attr": "displayName", "user_email_attr": "mail", "user_lookup_attr": "uid", "user_rdn": "uid" }
